question: What are the most unusual pets people keep, and can you generate an image of one?

steps.content: What are the most unusual pets people keep, and can you generate an image of one?
Plan: 1) Search for information on unusual pets people keep. 2) Generate an image of one of these pets. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for unusual pets that people keep.
Some of the most unusual pets people keep include axolotls, fennec foxes, and sugar gliders.
Generating an image of an axolotl.
Some of the most unusual pets people keep include axolotls, fennec foxes, and sugar gliders. Image of an axolotl generated.

true_answer: Some of the most unusual pets people keep include axolotls, fennec foxes, and sugar gliders. Image of an axolotl generated.
